ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Class_of_product is a class that has only individual products as members.
Products can be grouped into a class according to different different types of criteria, as illustrated below.
form:
the form of a product;
'Multi-stage centrifugal pump' is a class of product.
role:
the possible use of a product; 'Pump' is a class of product. 'Fire water pump' is a class of product.
'Fire water pump in complex A' is a class of product.
material structure type:
the nature and structure of the product at scales smaller than those of normal engineering concern. 'SG cast iron' is a class of product.
adminstrative:
the grouping of individual products for administrative purposes;
'1999 production run of pump type XYZ_123' is a class of product.
'Pumps maintained by J. Bloggs and Co.' is a class of product.
specification:
the specification of a product, for a particular engineering activity.
'J. Bloggs pump type XYZ_123' is a class of product. This class, defined by J. Bloggs and Co., may be specified in a purchase order.
The entity typeclass_of_product defined in this part of ISO 10303 is a specialisation of the entity type class_of_arranged_state defined in ISO/DIS 15926-2.
